name: Kyouiku Jisshuu: Joshikousei Maniacs
overview: The plot of Kyōiku Jisshū: Joshi Kōsei Maniacs is rather simple: the protagonist is an ordinary Japanese man named Shingo, who is about to become an intern in a prestigious school. There is only one thing that makes the young man slightly nervous: all his students will be girls. And if that weren't enough, some of his new co-workers are young attractive women. Will Shingo concentrate on his job or succumb to the pleasures of the flesh? The game is a very simple, low-interaction Japanese adventure. Every screen has four commands: "Look", "Talk", "Move", and - depending on the context - "Teach" or "Go Home". Each day is divided into morning and afternoon sections. The player must repeatedly visit different locations in the school in order to trigger events and advance the story.
